questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) In a natural outdoor setting
D) Inside a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) Insects on a nest

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A building
B) A group of people
C) A wasp nest
D) A piece of art

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A wasp nest with wasps
C) A tree
D) A person

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A cityscape
C) A blue sky with clouds
D) A river

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A bench
B) Grass, plants abd whasp
C) A road
D) A statue

What type of insects are visible in the photo?
A) Butterflies
B) Bees
C) Wasps
D) Ants

What kind of plants are surrounding the main subject?
A) Desert plants
B) Aquatic plants
C) Various grasses and stems
D) Tropical plants

What is the structure that the insects have built?
A) A hive
B) A nest
C) A burrow
D) A web

How many insects can be seen on the nest?
A) One
B) Two
C) Several
D) None

What color are the insects in the photo?
A) Green
B) Red
C) Black and yellow
D) Blue

What is the texture of the nest in the photo?
A) Smooth
B) Rough and papery
C) Metallic
D) Soft and fluffy

What is the primary activity of the insects in the photo?
A) Flying
B) Building the nest
C) Feeding
D) Resting

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Aerial view
B) Eye level
C) Low angle
D) High angle

What is the primary color of the sky in the photo?
A) Gray
B) Blue
C) Pink
D) Orange

What is the condition of the plants in the photo?
A) Withered
B) Fresh and green
C) Snow-covered
D) Burnt

What type of habitat is shown in the photo?
A) Aquatic
B) Terrestrial
C) Desert
D) Arctic

What is the significance of the nest's location?
A) It is hidden from predators
B) It is exposed to the elements
C) It is built high in the trees
D) It is submerged in water

What is the main color palette of the photo?
A) Warm tones
B) Cool tones
C) Neutral tones
D) Monochrome

What kind of branches are visible in the photo?
A) Leafy
B) Bare
C) Fruit-bearing
D) Thorny

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) First person
B) Third person
C) Over-the-shoulder
D) Point-of-view

What is the main subject's position in the photo?
A) Left
B) Right
C) Center
D) Top

What kind of stems are visible in the photo?
A) Thick and woody
B) Thin and flexible
C) Covered in thorns
D) Flowering

What is the overall impression of the photo?
A) Dynamic and lively
B) Calm and still
C) Dark and ominous
D) Bright and cheerful

What can be seen in the background of the photo?
A) A city skyline
B) A beach
C) A clear blue sky with some clouds
D) A mountain range
